Params[3]: After noticing a surprise assault on Oasis by some wandering Corrupted, Watanabe leaves you right where you are by yourself.

Params[4]: I should go and see if I can help.

Params[3]: Soldiers in Oasis are nervously preparing for the incoming attack.
Build up a defense line at the back!
Watch your surroundings! Beware of the Corrupted breaking through from the sides!
Ah? Aren't you the person next to Mr. Watanabe earlier?
Relax. Those Corrupted come every once in a while. We're already used to it.
They might be scary, all these bloodthirsty, mindless Corrupted...
But with Mr. Watanabe and the many Constructs here on our side...
No harm will come to you! So just stay here and relax!
But once you're done resting, remember to contribute to Oasis as well!
I should get going and assist them!

Params[2]: Alright. Now, let me contribute as well!
